item.title: Bitcoin plunges 28% from all-time high as Trump pump turns into slump
item.description: Trump’s tariff threats are weighing on the crypto market as investors flee risky assets.

item.title: Consumers are cutting back spending at the fastest clip in 4 years
item.description: Unseasonably cold weather along with increased uncertainty over tariffs and trade are casting a pall on the economy.

item.title: Bath & Body Works beat 2024 expectations, but its stock fell 12%. Its CEO says she was ‘surprised’ to see Wall Street’s reaction
item.description: Tariffs and uncertain consumer spending dampened Wall Street's enthusiasm for the retailer.

item.title: The DOGE-fueled firing of AI experts at the FDA endangers lives and worsens the hospital crisis
item.description: The FDA fired AI experts who conduct approvals for medical devices and might not get them back.

item.title: The legacy media is dead. Long live the legacy media
item.description: Our shared reality has always come from a mix of media, and once a medium has been instantiated, it never really goes away.
